page.title: 03TRADE, Shops.
page.content:
Broadwindsor Post office
There is only one Post office in Broadwindsor.The Post office sells groceries, sweets,frozenfoods,fruit and many more. The shopkeeper is very friendly and helpful. Most people go to the nearby towns of Crewkerne and Bridport to buy their groceries but the villlage shop is good for old people. Two of the other shops make and repair wooden things. One of the shops is called Dorset pines the other is called Chairs and crafts.There is another shop called the church book shop it sells books about church and religion.
